argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_gcdabs | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( abs ` A ) gcd ( abs ` B ) ) = ( A gcd B ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A gcd B ) = ( ( abs ` A ) gcd ( abs ` B ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A gcd B ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( ( abs ` A ) gcd ( abs ` B ) ) ^ 2 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nn0abscl | |- ( A e. ZZ -> ( abs ` A ) e. NN0 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_nn0abscl | |- ( B e. ZZ -> ( abs ` B ) e. NN0 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_nn0gcdsq | |- ( ( ( abs ` A ) e. NN0 /\ ( abs ` B ) e. NN0 ) -> ( ( ( abs ` A ) gcd ( abs ` B ) ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( ( abs ` A ) ^ 2 ) gcd ( ( abs ` B ) ^ 2 ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( abs ` A ) gcd ( abs ` B ) ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( ( abs ` A ) ^ 2 ) gcd ( ( abs ` B ) ^ 2 ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_zre | |- ( A e. ZZ -> A e. RR ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 10 |  | #P_absresq | |- ( A e. RR -> ( ( abs ` A ) ^ 2 ) = ( A ^ 2 ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( abs ` A ) ^ 2 ) = ( A ^ 2 ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_zre | |- ( B e. ZZ -> B e. RR ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 14 |  | #P_absresq | |- ( B e. RR -> ( ( abs ` B ) ^ 2 ) = ( B ^ 2 ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( abs ` B ) ^ 2 ) = ( B ^ 2 ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 15 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( abs ` A ) ^ 2 ) gcd ( ( abs ` B ) ^ 2 ) ) = ( ( A ^ 2 ) gcd ( B ^ 2 ) ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 7, 16 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A gcd B ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( A ^ 2 ) gcd ( B ^ 2 ) ) ) |
